name: Public Works Act
description: Laws to incentivize clear right of ways for shared roads and infrastructure

properties.Title: Prevent Claiming in Road District
properties.UserDescription: Once road districts are established no one can claim inside them, unclaiming still allowed

List.contextDescription: Was the property claimed or unclaimed?
Was the property claimed or unclaimed?

User.contextDescription: The citizen who claimed or unclaimed the land.

Target.contextDescription: The citizen who claimed or unclaimed the land.

properties.Title: Eminent Domain in Road District
properties.UserDescription: Anyone can clear or build in a road district

Location.contextDescription: The position where the interaction took place.

properties.Title: Allow Branch Clearing
properties.UserDescription: Anyone can clear branches if they are obstructing roadways or their property

properties.Title: Tree Felling Tax
properties.UserDescription: A tax on felling a shared resource, can be recouped by clearing the stump

properties.Title: Stone Road Incentive
properties.UserDescription: Encourage placing Stone Road and Stone Ramps in the Road district and discourage removing it
